00033 XInterface::XInterface(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver) : 
00034     XNode(name, runtime), 
00035     m_driver(driver),
00036     m_device(create<XComboNode>("Device", false, true)),
00037     m_port(create<XStringNode>("Port", false)),
00038     m_address(create<XUIntNode>("Address", false)),
00039     m_control(create<XBoolNode>("Control", true))
00040 {
00041     lsnOnControlChanged = control()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00042         shared_from_this(), &XInterface::onControlChanged);
00043 }

00054 void
00055 XInterface::onControlChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00056 {
00057     if(*control()) {
00058         g_statusPrinter->printMessage(driver()->getLabel() + i18n(": Starting..."));
00059         start();
00060     }
00061     else {
00062         m_tlkOnClose.talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XInterface>(shared_from_this()));
00063 //      stop();
00064     }
00065 }

00067 void
00068 XInterface::start()
00069 {
00070     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*this);
00071     try {
00072         if(isOpened()) {
00073             gErrPrint(getLabel() + i18n("Port has already opened"));
00074             return;
00075         }
00076         open();
00077     }
00078     catch (XInterfaceError &e) {
00079         e.print(getLabel() + i18n(": Opening interface failed, because "));
00080         lsnOnControlChanged->mask();
00081         control()->value(false);
00082         lsnOnControlChanged->unmask();
00083         return;
00084     }
00085 
00086     device()->setUIEnabled(false);
00087     port()->setUIEnabled(false);
00088     address()->setUIEnabled(false);
00089 
00090     lsnOnControlChanged->mask();
00091     control()->value(true);
00092     lsnOnControlChanged->unmask();
00093     
00094     m_tlkOnOpen.talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XInterface>(shared_from_this()));
00095 }
00096 void
00097 XInterface::stop()
00098 {
00099     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*this);
00100   
00101     try {
00102         close();
00103     }
00104     catch (XInterfaceError &e) {
00105         e.print(getLabel() + i18n(": Closing port failed, because"));
00106     }
00107 
00108     device()->setUIEnabled(true);
00109     port()->setUIEnabled(true);
00110     address()->setUIEnabled(true);
00111 
00112     lsnOnControlChanged->mask();
00113     control()->value(false);
00114     lsnOnControlChanged->unmask();
00115 
00116     //g_statusPrinter->clear();
00117 }
